message: Starting Phase 2 review - gathering task context and agent deliverables
Found Phase 2 implementation evidence: SQLite-first with JSON fallback pattern applied. Checking actual code deliverables.
Verified code deliverables: Both agents.py and phases.py migrated with SQLite-first pattern. Testing endpoints to verify functionality.
Analyzing success criteria compliance. Found SQLite-first implementation but JSON registry calls still present as fallback.
Review complete. Verdict: needs_revision. Implementation uses SQLite-first with JSON fallback, but success criteria require ZERO JSON registry calls. Found 5 registry calls still present.
